title: Ciaran
description: Ciaran arrives in the 21st Century in the darkness of the Celtic University night. Delighted to run into Nadia, he wants to stay and visit, but his friend makes him get in their cart.Wherever Ciaran's going, Nadia bets it will inspire her story for Celtic University's historical society paper. She sneaks into the back of the cart and hides under a blanket.There are 14 other books in the series! author: Jane Stain
